attributes.action: Make representation to the fuel companies and DEMAND A REDUCTION in price for petrol and diesel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now time that something is done about the totally inappropriate cost of the price of fuel, namely Unleaded Petrol and Common Diesel that is charged at forecourt pumps.
Given the country is in a deep recession we find it ABHORRENT that fuel companies can raise the cost of fuel by some 4PENCE per litre of fuel as recent, and AT WILL.
Notice is hereby given, That we the undersigned want ACTION and not empty promises to take the cost of fuel back to a satisfactory price of 0.50p/ltr
If the mortgage companies have to follow suit to reduce their charges, then the fuel companies should be made MANDATORY to follow suit.
Swings and roundabouts is the phrase commonly used, Where is OUR fuel reduction.
